snippet.title: Flat Heroes - Friends Trailer
snippet.description:
Important this is a beta version of the game, final visuals changed a bit:

Flat Heroes is out now and has a FREE DEMO:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/508790/Flat_Heroes/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/flat-heroes-switch/
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-lb/product/EP2228-CUSA23047_00-8320441071704590/
Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/flat-heroes-fec628

For more info and tips: 
https://twitter.com/FlatHeroes
